sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: If you use inetd, add this line to /etc/inetd.conf:

para.userinput: sgi_fam/1-2 stream rpc/tcp wait root /usr/bin/fam fam

sect3.para: If you use xinetd, create the /etc/xinetd.d/fam file as:

screen.userinput: # default: on # description: FAM - file alteration monitor service sgi_fam { type = RPC UNLISTED socket_type = stream user = root group = nobody server = /usr/bin/fam wait = yes protocol = tcp rpc_version = 2 rpc_number = 391002 }
